attributes.action: pressure the Football Association to accept its moral obligation to either stop accepting new members to the Englandfans club as they cannot guarantee their members tickets to matches at Wembley or to increase the ticket allocation to match the membership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The FA are encouraging more membership when the current membership numbers exceeeds the proposed allocation. Long standing members face the possiblity of not obtaining tickets 
Given the capacity of Wembley it is reasonable and morally right that all members of Englandfans have the right to an England match ticket at home
